programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S6
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: MasterChef Junior USA S8
programme.desc: The four remaining junior chefs pair up with WWE Superstars, who are much more comfortable in the ring. The winning junior receives tickets to a WWE match! In the elimination challenge, the chefs prepare one of Gordon Ramsay's signature dishes.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S1
programme.desc: A culinary guessing game in which bakers must decode what type of dessert using just crumbs and a few elusive clues. They have to recreate the recipe and the judges will determine how closely it matches the missing dessert.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby S2
programme.desc: In this insightful and entertaining programme, Giles and Monica travel to South Africa - where they experience a land of contrasts through working in two very different hotels. The Silo is an industrialchic, luxury art-themed hotel in the heart of Cape Town. It sits in the former elevator shaft of a 90-year-old, 187-foot grain silo and on top of the new Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa - the African equivalent of the Tate Modern - within the same repurposed historic building.

programme.title: Celebrity Wheel Of Fortune S2
programme.desc: Various celebrities compete against each other by solving word puzzles in order to win cash prizes that are determined by a spinning wheel.

programme.title: Serengeti S2
programme.desc: Gnu, the wildebeest calf, and Shani's foal face the greatest challenge of their young lives. They must cross the treacherous river. Shani and her foal are first to attempt the crossing, but the crocodiles have been waiting for this moment. If her foal survives, another huge challenge awaits - a wall of angry hippos will be blocking his way. Tamu, the young gazelle, is now orphaned and trying to stay alive.

programme.desc: (PG)(重) 钢铁大叔 黄仲昆 及 黄远跟着 民雄 到部落玩啰！民雄带着黄仲昆父子前往花莲的奇美部落体验当地特有的 文化泛舟旅程。他们一起感受有「活的博物馆」之称的阿美族奇美部落的特殊游程。这趟旅程更像是‘'耍Man之旅‘' - 砍木头、爬树、撒网捕鱼。再去一趟既冒险又有文化史观的‘'泛舟行程‘'！这个小小的部落是传说中阿美族文化的发源地。至今延续的男子阶级制度,让黄仲昆父子感受了特有的旅行经验。今年夏天你还在找能玩水有文青风的行程吗？.
